name: Alice
personality: Friendly, approachable, and customer-oriented. Enjoys interacting with customers and providing personalized recommendations.
responsibility: Managing the sales floor, assisting customers with product selections, and ensuring a positive shopping experience.

name: Bob
personality: Analytical, detail-oriented, and organized. Excels in managing inventory and analyzing sales data to optimize stock levels.
responsibility: Overseeing inventory management, conducting regular stock checks, and coordinating with suppliers for timely replenishment.

name: Superman
personality: Intelligent, mysterious, and brave. Excels in detective work and combat.
responsibility: Protecting Gotham City, solving mysteries, and combating threats.
